trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>이 이벤트는 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)를 통해 또는 프로그래밍 방식으로 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>클래스 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> 에서</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> 메서드 호출을 통해 사용자에 의해 폼이 닫히기 바로 전에 발생</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: 모든 자식 또는 소유 된 폼을 폼에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>이벤트는 또한 각각에 대해 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If any one of the forms cancels the event, none of the forms are closed.
trans-unit.target: 형식 중 하나에서 이벤트를 취소 하는 경우 폼 닫힙니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are not sent to any of the forms.
trans-unit.target: 해당 따라서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>이벤트 형식 중 하나에 보내지지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosingEventArgs class provides data for this event.
trans-unit.target: FormClosingEventArgs 클래스는이 이벤트에 대 한 데이터를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Two important members are the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> properties.
The event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to true.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 설정 하 여 취소할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 true로.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides a reason why the form is being closed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"></xref> class.

The `closeReason` and `cancel` parameters are used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `closeReason` 및 `cancel` 매개 변수는 초기화에 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>및 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 각각.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> 폼을 닫는 이유는 이유를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트를 취소 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: 폼을 닫는 이유를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>다양 한 이유로, 사용자가 시작한 방법과 프로그래밍 방식으로 닫힐 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The CloseReason property indicates a reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: CloseReason 속성 클로저에 대 한 이유를 나타냅니다.
